name: Mutton for Punishment 3
summary: Mutton for Punishment - Endurance gaming just got tasty! The survival of your flock is at stake. Deep in the hills of Wales, you must defend your flock against the vicious wolf. In Mutton for Punishment’s rapid-fire game, you must use your sling shot to protect your flock and destroy the pesky wolfs flaming arrows before they flambé them! Launch the stones from your slingshot at the correct time to destroy the arrows and collect baawsome power-ups.
